articles.title: Brad Pitt happier with Jennifer Aniston than Angelina Jolie, bodyguard claims - Micky News
articles.description: Brad Pitt was reportedly happier when he was with his first wife Jennifer Aniston than Angelina Jolie, according to his bodyguard.
articles.content:
Brad Pitt married Jennifer Aniston in 2000, but they divorced five years later. He dated Angelina Jolie shortly after their split, and they got married in 2014. However, they also separated in 2016.
